title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example has excessive flashing.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically only, it is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically only, there should be no flashing of the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically only.
3. Observe if any flashing of the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames occurs.
